items.name: Pollo
items.description: Chicken roasted in an Orange Tinga sauce, Guacamole, Pickled Red Onion, Marinated Cabbage, House Crema

items.name: Tamale of the Day
items.description: Topped with House Crema, Pico de gallo, Cilantro, Cotija, and Pickled Red Onion
items.note: 2 tamales per order Sauce: Choose Red, Green or Both

items.name: Skillet Corn
items.description: Shaved grilled corn with bacon lardons, roasted poblano, onions and lime. Topped with seasoned mayo, cilantro, cotija and house chile seasoning.

items.name: Black Beans
items.description: with roasted garlic and Mexican spices. Topped with cilantro and cotija.
